entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9 except minus 4 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h near noon. High minus 9 except minus 4 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 except minus 14 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18 except minus 14 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
